message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a deal like this anywhere else. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. However, I have to make a living, and $9000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $10500. This is my final compromise, so I hope you can see the value in this amazing product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9800. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I'm glad you're willing to go up to $9800, Bob, but I'm still a bit below my minimum. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering $10200. This is my last offer, so I hope you can see the value in this amazing product.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $9900. Can you consider this offer?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob! However, I still need to make a profit, so I'm willing to meet you at $10000. This is my final offer, and I'm confident you won't find a deal like this anywhere else.
